name: CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_TYPE
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Support & Services Audit Trail - Type (I HSB 64140) item.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the historical support and service type information in the episode record. Together with EPISODE_ID, this forms the foreign key for CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the support and services type in the snapshot of the support and services audit trail (SI HSB 64140) and associated with the support and service type in CMGMT_SUPPORT_TYPE_HX.

columns.name: SC_SUPPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The support and service type category ID for the episode.
